main event: Visual confirmation of a satellite decay event occurred from June 2-3, 1965, in Europe, specifically in Germany and Spain.
interesting points: The event was confirmed visually by civilians,The report pertains to an object associated with a satellite decay,Potential observers in France reported cloud cover which may have obstructed views, The decay event involved a satellite identified as KSTARFLASH 13, The type of observation recorded was ground-visual.
